Because the purple rubber cylinder and the blue rubber cylinder moved toward the yellow rubber sphere.
Because the blue rubber cylinder moved toward the yellow rubber sphere.
Because the yellow rubber sphere moved spontaneously.

If the blue rubber cylinder had not moved toward the yellow rubber sphere, would the yellow rubber sphere still have moved?

Was the fact that the blue rubber cylinder moved toward the yellow rubber sphere necessary for the yellow rubber sphere to move?

options: The blue rubber cylinder moves toward the yellow rubber sphere.
The purple rubber cylinder moves toward the yellow rubber sphere.
The purple rubber cylinder and the blue rubber cylinder move toward the yellow rubber sphere.
